p: Due to the low signal-to-noise ratio obtained in the transmission mode, humidity-dependent d 001 values were determined with Bragg’s law after fitting a Gaussian function of the background-corrected 001 reflection. These analyses produced d 001 data for AcidBir only. Diffractograms of the considerably smaller δ-MnO 2 particles were of insufficient quality to extract reliable d 001 values, and are therefore not reported.
